ping: This command was run by {{interaction.user.username}}, who joined on {{interaction.member.joinedAt}}.

mod_log.mute: 🔇  **{{user.username}}** has been muted by **{{moderator.username}}** for **{{duration}}**. Reason:```{{reason}}```
mod_log.timed_ban: {{emoji}}  **{{user.username}}** has been banned by **{{moderator.username}}** for **{{duration}}**. Reason:```{{reason}}```
mod_log.change_warn: <t:{{time}}> `[{{case}}]` ‚úèÔ∏è Case #{{case}}, has been modified by **{{moderator.username}}**. Reason:```{{reason}}```
mod_log.unban: üîì User (`{{user.id}}`) has been unbanned by **{{moderator.username}}**. Reason:```{{reason}}```
mod_log.ban_expired: üîì User (`{{user.id}}`) has been automatically unbanned by **{{moderator.username}}** after **{{duration}}**. Reason:```{{reason}}```
mod_log.timeout: üîá **{{user.username}}** has been timed out by **{{moderator.username}}** for **{{duration}}**. Reason:```{{reason}}```

function_errors.no_guild_config: Guild config not found, creating one, this stops the mod_log_operation. To disable this warning change the "Function Warnings" setting.
function_errors.channel_error: An error occurred while trying to send the message. This is likely due to the channel being deleted or the bot not having permission to send messages. Please check the channel and try again. This error removes the modlog channel id from the guild config.
function_errors.case_id_error: An error occurred while trying to increment the case id. This is likely a database error on our side. This will likely cause duplicate case ids. Please report this to the bot developers.
function_errors.no_modlog_channel: No modlog channel is set in the guild config. Please set one to enable modlog.

bump_leaderboard.last_winner: Last month's winner: {{user}} with `{{count}}` bump out of **{{totalBump}}** bumps.
bump_leaderboard.message_not_sent_by_bot: There are messages in the bump leaderboard channel that are not sent by the bot. Please remove them to avoid errors.

unregistered_people.kick_message: You have failed to register in **{{server}}** server within **{{days}}** days. You have been kicked from the server.
unregistered_people.initial: Member failed to register within {{days}} days.

role_config.initial: Select the setting you want to update.

role_config.member_description: The role given when member registers.

role_config.female_description: The role given when member registers as female.

role_config.colour_of_the_day_description: A role that changes every day.
role_config.mute_description: The role given when member gets muted.
role_config.dj_description: A role that bypasses the music command restrictions.

dj_role.set: DJ role has been set to {{role}}.

register_day_limit.label: Set Register Day Limit
register_day_limit.description: The limit of days a user has to register.
register_day_limit.description_one: Sets the register day limit to 1 day.
register_day_limit.description_three: Sets the register day limit to 3 days.
register_day_limit.description_seven: Sets the register day limit to 7 days.
register_day_limit.initial: Select the one you want to set.
register_day_limit.success: Register day limit has been set to {{days}} days.

default_expiry.label: Set Default Expiry
default_expiry.description: The default expiry for the infractions.
default_expiry.description_seven: Sets the default expiry to 7 days.
default_expiry.description_fourteen: Sets the default expiry to 14 days.
default_expiry.description_thirty: Sets the default expiry to 30 days.
default_expiry.initial: Select the one you want to set.
default_expiry.success: Default expiry has been set to {{days}} days.
